subject: In search of Matt Hoppe
body:
Ecxuse me for my mistake. I've started to receive letters from BTS about
the old package and I've mistaken them for the maintainer's activity.
I've been waiting for it for too long, and that is the case of the
blunder. 

and bad mail adderss :(


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-legal-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
